CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Zinc
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: zinc
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Zinc is a cool, bluish-silver metal with a distinctive character. It not only protects other metals from corrosion through galvanization but also plays a crucial role in modern alloy production.
